CommitContainer.title: CommitContainer
CommitContainer.summary: Creates an asynchronous task to store a specified container in an elastic container instance as an image and pushes the image to an image repository of Alibaba Cloud Container Registry.

CopyDataCache.title: CopyDataCache
CopyDataCache.summary: Copies a DataCache from one region to another region.

CreateImageCache.title: CreateImageCache
CreateImageCache.summary: Creates an image cache. The image cache can accelerate image pulling and reduce the instance startup time when you create an elastic container instance later.

CreateInstanceOpsTask.title: CreateInstanceOpsTask
CreateInstanceOpsTask.summary: Creates an operations and maintenance task.

CreateVirtualNode.title: CreateVirtualNode
CreateVirtualNode.summary: Creates a VNode to connect self-managed Kubernetes clusters to elastic container instances.

DescribeAvailableResource.title: DescribeAvailableResource
DescribeAvailableResource.summary: Queries the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance families that are available in a specified region and zone.

DescribeCommitContainerTask.title: DescribeCommitContainerTask
DescribeCommitContainerTask.summary: Queries the details of a CommitContainer task.

DescribeContainerGroupEvents.title: DescribeContainerGroupEvents
DescribeContainerGroupEvents.summary: Queries event information about multiple container groups at a time.

DescribeContainerGroupMetric.title: DescribeContainerGroupMetric
DescribeContainerGroupMetric.summary: Queries the monitoring data of an elastic container instance.

DescribeContainerGroupPrice.title: DescribeContainerGroupPrice
DescribeContainerGroupPrice.summary: Queries the price of an elastic container instance.

DescribeContainerGroupStatus.title: DescribeContainerGroupStatus
DescribeContainerGroupStatus.summary: Queries the statuses of multiple container groups at a time.

DescribeContainerGroups.title: DescribeContainerGroups
DescribeContainerGroups.summary: Queries information about multiple elastic container instances at a time.

DescribeContainerLog.title: DescribeContainerLog
DescribeContainerLog.summary: Queries the logs of a container in a container group.

DescribeDataCaches.title: DescribeDataCaches
DescribeDataCaches.summary: Queries the information about data caches.

DescribeInstanceOpsRecords.title: DescribeInstanceOpsRecords
DescribeInstanceOpsRecords.summary: Queries the information about operations and maintenance tasks of an elastic container instance.

DescribeMultiContainerGroupMetric.title: DescribeMultiContainerGroupMetric
DescribeMultiContainerGroupMetric.summary: Queries the monitoring data of elastic container instances.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions and zones in which Elastic Container Instance is available.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are added to an Elastic Container Instance resource.

ListUsage.title: ListUsage
ListUsage.summary: Queries the used amounts and upper limits of privileges and quotas that you have in a specified region.

ResizeContainerGroupVolume.title: ResizeContainerGroupVolume
ResizeContainerGroupVolume.summary: Scales up a disk volume that is mounted to an elastic container instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Adds tags to an Elastic Container Instance resource.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from an Elastic Container Instance resource.

UpdateVirtualNode.title: UpdateVirtualNode
UpdateVirtualNode.summary: Updates attributes of a virtual node.
